data.lyric:
[ti:In Between]
[ar:Scotty McCreery]
[al:Seasons Change]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]In Between - Scotty McCreery (斯考迪-迈克克里瑞)
[00:07.80]Written by：Scotty McCreery/Frank Rogers/Jessi Alexander/Jonathan Singleton
[00:15.60]I'm a little bit a ball cap
[00:17.67]Little bit a pearl snap button down shirt
[00:21.62]
[00:23.78]Little bit a big city concrete
[00:26.54]But a lot more small town dirt
[00:29.09]
[00:31.25]I can see your pretty eyes
[00:33.24]Reading me like a map
[00:35.66]Wondering who I am
[00:37.18]And where I'm at
[00:39.06]
[00:40.76]I'm in between
[00:45.39]Friday night wild
[00:46.27]
[00:46.94]And quiet Sunday morning
[00:48.84]Between
[00:51.97]
[00:53.38]Done after one
[00:54.61]And keep on pouring
[00:57.42]Ain't too high
[00:58.66]
[00:59.18]Ain't too low
[01:00.84]Just holding down the middle
[01:02.80]I'm steady as I go
[01:04.91]I ain't all holy water
[01:07.32]And I ain't all Jim Dean
[01:10.18]
[01:10.83]I'm somewhere in between
[01:14.94]
[01:19.94]I can be a steel toe work boot
[01:22.84]40 hour blue collar mud on my jeans
[01:26.61]
[01:28.25]Then on weekend pack a bag
[01:30.69]Disappear kick back on a white sand beach
[01:34.41]
[01:36.15]I'm a far cry from being
[01:38.91]A one night stand
[01:40.45]But I ain't ready
[01:42.25]For a ring on my hand
[01:44.64]
[01:45.70]I'm in between
[01:50.41]Friday night wild
[01:51.80]And quiet Sunday morning
[01:53.72]Between
[01:57.00]
[01:58.31]Done after one
[01:59.68]And keep on pouring
[02:02.32]Ain't too high
[02:03.89]Ain't too low
[02:05.76]Just holding down the middle
[02:07.52]I'm steady as I go
[02:09.62]I ain't all holy water
[02:12.22]And I ain't all Jim Dean
[02:15.66]I'm somewhere in between
[02:19.69]
[02:33.19]I can see your pretty eyes
[02:35.47]Reading me like a map
[02:37.62]Wondering who I am
[02:38.90]And where I'm at
[02:40.70]
[02:42.67]I'm in between
[02:44.29]
[02:47.30]Friday night wild
[02:49.03]And quiet Sunday morning
[02:51.14]Between
[02:51.98]
[02:55.33]Done after one
[02:56.85]And keep on pouring
[02:59.37]Ain't too high
[03:00.40]
[03:01.11]Ain't too low
[03:02.23]
[03:02.74]Just holding down the middle
[03:04.84]I'm steady as I go
[03:06.64]I ain't all holy water
[03:09.38]And I ain't all Jim Dean
[03:12.66]I'm somewhere in between
[03:16.11]
[03:20.52]Yeah I'm somewhere in between
